title: The real reason behind Bitcoin’s skyrocketing prices – Michael Novogratz spills all
description: In a recent interview on CNBC’s “Squawk Box,” Michael Novogratz, the founder and CEO of Galaxy Digital, shared his insights on the current state of the cryptocurrency market. Novogratz highlighted Bitcoin’s remarkable surge of 150% over the past year, attributing this rally to its role as an alternative to fiat currencies and a response to […]

title: Hester Peirce challenges SEC’s harsh fine on BarnBridge DAO
description: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission’s (SEC) decision to impose a $1.7 million fine on BarnBridge DAO and its founders for failing to register their SMART Yield bond offerings has sparked a notable dissent from within the agency. SEC Commissioner Hester Peirce, known in the cryptocurrency community as ‘Crypto mom,’ has openly criticized the decision, […]

title: BitMEX founder has a warning about spot ETF approval
description: Arthur Hayes has an ETF warning: Asset managers may try to hold "all the Bitcoin in circulation." If that happens, it could ultimately lead to the asset's decline.
